name: VR Monster Shoot Show
description:
Gun down goblins, reel in skeletons, or saw down anyone who gets too close in this fast-paced arena shooting gallery.

Hype up that audience! Dirigibles and skateboards are no match for you!

Drop in for 15 minutes, or keep the shoot show going in endurance mode.

The entire game runs on an exposed scripting system, so change it up or build your own waves and levels.

Support our fiddle-players! Get the soundtrack

Small indie game made with <3

Note: Plays best with a VR headset. The game was designed as a VR experience, though it does work with keyboard + mouse.
